description:
Crisis Action is a free-to-play tactical shooter that puts you in command of an elite SWAT team. As the team leader, it's your job to neutralize threats and diffuse dangerous situations. Each mission drops you into a new crisis where terrorists have taken hostages or are plotting attacks. Using your tactical map, you'll direct your squad to breach and clear rooms, neutralize enemies, and rescue civilians. Communicate orders to have them throw flashbangs, provide cover fire, or kick down doors. With a variety of weapons, gear, and unique soldier classes at your disposal, you'll need to think strategically about how to approach each scenario. Make sure to use overwatch positions, stack up at entries, and coordinate pincer movements to gain the upper hand. As you complete missions you'll earn cash to upgrade your team with better armor, weapons and abilities. You can also craft new weapons and gear. Unlock new characters like snipers, shields or medics to customize your squad.

Crisis Action delivers an immersive tac-shooter experience on mobile. Will you have what it takes to handle intense sieges, hostage situations and more as the leader of an elite tactical squad?
name: Crisis Action

Will you have what it takes to handle intense sieges, hostage situations and more as the leader of an elite tactical squad?
